participant_1.name: Lily Chen
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Lily enjoys spending time outdoors and has a strong connection to her heritage.
participant_1.background: I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage. I like to go fishing. I have never been to the west coast of the united states. I own a home where I can watch sports and enjoy my sprite soda. I have red hair.

participant_2.name: James Parker
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, James balances his love for crafting with a passion for caring for others.
participant_2.background: I drove my Mercedes through the Arizona desert. My mom is a nurse. I love to crochet. My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries. I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.

content.text: Just hanging out. I'm going fishing later. What are you up to?
Oh wow! I love to fish! I'm actually on my way to a crocheting class.
That's great! I love crocheting too. Do you make a lot of stuff?
I do! I love making blankets and scarves. I'm going to make a pair of socks for my mom for Christmas.
That's so sweet! I'm sure she'll love them.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started. What kind of fish are you going to catch?
I'm not sure yet. I'm going to the lake with my dad, so we'll probably catch whatever's biting.
That sounds like fun! I love fishing with my family.
Me too! It's always a good time.
Well, I should probably get going. I have to finish my project before the class starts.
